coref_content: Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao prove that Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao have fully recover from a right shoulder injury by score a career - good 19 point in Mahindra's 108 - 69 win over the Davao - base Gold Star in a pocket tournament in General Santos City last Saturday. Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao highlight Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao's game by bury five three - pointer to the delight of the crowd. Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao Mahindra, which acquire Nino KG" Canaleta, Aldrech Ramos and Rob Reyes to beef up Mahindra's lineup, will face Globalport in the final today. Mahindra, accord to Mahindra assistant coach Chito Victolero, finish the elimination round with a 3 - 1 card – Mahindra's only defeat be inflict by the Batang Pier of Coach Pido Jarencio. Mahindra assistant coach Chito Victolero say Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao be happy with the preparation of Mahindra for the come Philippine Cup as Mahindra ’re hope to make it to the playoff this time. very satisfied Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao, " say Mahindra assistant coach Chito Victolero. Mahindra ’re here hope to improve on Mahindra's weakness and also kung ano man yung strength ng team, mapa - ganda pa namin. " Mahindra team manager Erik Pineda say Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao will be more active this season as compare to Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao's first year in the pro league that see Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao play just four game due to Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao's training when Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao fight undefeated world champion Floyd Mayweather Jr. last May. unknown to many, Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao be already hurt when Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao fight undefeated world champion Floyd Mayweather Jr.. Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao have a surgery to repair a tear right rotator cuff ( shoulder ). Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao score just a single point as a the pro league rookie when Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao split Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao's free throw in a game against the Star Hotshots during the elimination round of the Commissioner ’s Cup. Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao miss all six attempt from the field in Mahindra player - coach Manny Pacquiao's first pro season, include 0 - for-4 from three - point territory ..
